p:
The first author had the initial idea to create the BGC podcast in February 2019, one year before the podcast actually launched. During the year, she undertook a number of activities to determine the viability of the podcast idea, including conducting market research to determine the following:
Current number of active environmental podcasts and the themes covered under each, and how much they prioritized experiences of DQTBIPOC.
Availability and possible quantity of environmentalists to interview over a span of at least two years.
Equipment and production costs.
Time commitment required to produce episodes and implement a marketing strategy.
Demand or level of interest based on feedback from potential listeners and guests.
